name: GET_suppression-unsubscribes
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a list of all email address that are globally suppressed.**

start_time.description: Refers start of the time range in unix timestamp when an unsubscribe email was created (inclusive).

end_time.description: Refers end of the time range in unix timestamp when an unsubscribe email was created (inclusive).

limit.description: The number of results to display on each page.

offset.description: The point in the list of results to begin displaying global suppressions.

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

$ul: **created**: A Unix timestamp indicating when the recipient was added to the global suppression list.
**email**: The email address of the recipient who is globally suppressed.
